response.original_title: 心霊vs人間 北海道縦断 宣戦布告編
response.overview: Daisuke Morishima, Ryua, Shizuku Hoshino, and ZeNrA, who have an absolute following among young people on Internet video distribution services, take on the challenge of visiting terrifying haunted places in this third horror documentary. The four psychic mavericks embark on a journey across Hokkaido with high-tech equipment and blasphemous acts in order to capture the spirits.
response.title: Psychic vs. Human: Hokkaido Vertical Assault Declaration Edition

titles.title: Psychic vs Human: Hokkaido Jūdan - Sensen Fukoku-hen
